com.pushtechnology.diffusion.transform.messaging.send

Interface RequestToSessionSender<T,U,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of response understood by Diffusion
    U - the type of request
    V - the type of response

    public interface RequestToSessionSender<T,U,V>
    A sender of values as request. May transform them before sending. May transform the response received.
    Author:
    Push Technology Limited

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  RequestToSessionSender.TransformedFilterCallback<R,S>
      The callback for transformed responses.

      Send a request.
      CompletableFuture<Integer> sendRequest(String sessionFilter, String path, U request, RequestToSessionSender.TransformedFilterCallback<T,V> callback)
      Send a request to many sessions.

    • Method Detail

      • sendRequest

        CompletableFuture<V> sendRequest(com.pushtechnology.diffusion.client.session.SessionId sessionId,
                                 String path,
                                 U request)
                          throws TransformationException
        Send a request.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the recipient of the request

      • sendRequest

        CompletableFuture<Integer> sendRequest(String sessionFilter,
                                       String path,
                                       U request,
                                       RequestToSessionSender.TransformedFilterCallback<T,V> callback)
                                throws TransformationException
        Send a request to many sessions.
        Parameters:
        sessionFilter - the recipient of the request
        path - the path to send the request to
        request - the request
        callback - the callback that receives the responses
        Returns:
        the number of requests sent
        Throws:
        TransformationException - if the request cannot be transformed
